engagementSection.title: Engagement
engagementSection.firstGiftText: Your gift allowed nearly {{amount}} people to donate for the first time

modalFirstTime.title: Where does this number come from?
modalFirstTime.description: Internal research showed that on average 40% of our users made the first donation of their lives through Ribon's plataform.

modalFee.title: How Ribon’s fee works
modalFee.description: Your gift is either 100% donated or boosted before being donated (we only charge a 10% fee on the added value).

giftBoostSection.title: Gift Boost
giftBoostSection.increaseAmount: Increase of gift used so far
giftBoostSection.amountToCause: Amount that goes to the cause

impactSection.title: Your impact
impactSection.subtitle: How the numbers translate into impact.

indirect.title: Indirect impact
indirect.subtitle: Your gift inspired new people to contribute with the cause as well.

card.title: The boost of {{boost}} of your gift was raised by

ribonActions.subtitle: Now it’s up to Ribon!
ribonActions.description: Our job is to make the best with the {{boost}} boost, as we did with your gift. We will:
ribonActions.action1: Engage new donors with donation tickets
ribonActions.action2: Designate the donations to verified high impact NGOs
ribonActions.action3: Inspire new donors to contribute as well

card.finalMessage: Together we can make charity a habit!

banner.title: Make a new gift
banner.description: Contact our team to make a new gift

signInPage.emailSentDescription: Please, click the safety link we sent you to confirm your account and enable your access.
signInPage.emailSentErrorDescription: Please, check if the e-mail provided is correct or contact our support team.
signInPage.footerStartText: By clicking Confirm you agree on Ribon’s

layoutHeader.signOutDescription: If you want to access this page again, you’ll need to sign back in.
